about_the_game:
This is the fan pack for Ouch!War!

Players who buy this DLC can use the character "Blue blinky" in the game. The character is the proof of you supporting this game.

The character "Blue blinky" has more attack but less life than other two characters. This character will be amazing for players with long playing time and masterful playing skills.

Thanks again for anyone who play our game and support us!

PS：Blue blinky character background
Blue blinky was a warrior who was set up to death. But he rose from his death by absorbing a mysterious energy under the ground. For revenge, Blue blinky is coming back with blue flame and became the phantom of power. With the despair toward the world, the revenge  journey starts. — I'm back. Humans.
detailed_description:
This is the fan pack for Ouch!War!

Players who buy this DLC can use the character "Blue blinky" in the game. The character is the proof of you supporting this game.

The character "Blue blinky" has more attack but less life than other two characters. This character will be amazing for players with long playing time and masterful playing skills.

Thanks again for anyone who play our game and support us!

PS：Blue blinky character background
Blue blinky was a warrior who was set up to death. But he rose from his death by absorbing a mysterious energy under the ground. For revenge, Blue blinky is coming back with blue flame and became the phantom of power. With the despair toward the world, the revenge  journey starts. — I'm back. Humans.
name: Ouch!War!-Blue blinky Character pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i5-4210U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i5-4210U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 840M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game Ouch！War！ on Steam in order to play.
